Interface ISOReportable

All Superinterfaces:
Bean, com.guidewire.pl.persistence.core.BeanMethods, BundleProvider, Comparable<Bean>, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable

@Generated(value="com.guidewire.pl.metadata.codegen.Codegen", comments="ISOReportable.eti;ISOReportable.eix;ISOReportable.etx") public interface ISOReportable extends KeyableBean
ISOReportable Common fields used to track communication with ISO about a Claim or Exposure.

  • Method Details

    • addNewISOMatchReport

      ISOMatchReport addNewISOMatchReport()
      Add a new match report to the array of match reports on this Claim/Exposure
      Returns:
      the newly created match report

    • addToISOMatchReports

      void addToISOMatchReports(ISOMatchReport report)
      Add the given match report to the array of match reports on this Claim/Exposure
      Parameters:
      report - the report to be added

    • getISOClaim

      Claim getISOClaim()
      The claim associated with this Claim/Exposure. For a Claim, just returns itself, for an exposure, returns the exposure's Claim.
      Returns:
      the Claim

    • getISOErrorMessage

      String getISOErrorMessage()
      Error message if most recent ISO ClaimSearch request failed. Otherwise null.
      Returns:
      the error message, or null

    • getISOExposure

      Exposure getISOExposure()
      If this is an exposure, returns itself, otherwise returns null
      Returns:
      the Exposure, or null

    • getISOMatchReports

      ISOMatchReport[] getISOMatchReports()
      Returns an array of the match reports associated with this Claim/Exposure, in random order
      Returns:
      a non null array of match reports

    • getISOReceiveDate

      Date getISOReceiveDate()
      Gets the value of the ISOReceiveDate field. The last time a response was received from ISO for this object.

    • getISOSendDate

      Date getISOSendDate()
      Gets the value of the ISOSendDate field. The last time a search request was sent to ISO.

    • getISOStatus

      ISOStatus getISOStatus()
      Gets the value of the ISOStatus field. Status of exposure with ISO - for example checked, not of interest.

    • isISOKnown

      Boolean isISOKnown()
      Gets the value of the ISOKnown field. Has a search request for this object been successfully received by ISO?

    • removeFromISOMatchReports

      void removeFromISOMatchReports(ISOMatchReport report)
      Remove the given match report form the array of match reports on this Claim/Exposure
      Parameters:
      report - the report to be removed

    • setISOErrorMessage

      void setISOErrorMessage(String isoErrorMessage)
      Set error message if most recent ISO ClaimSearch request failed.
      Parameters:
      isoErrorMessage - the new error message

    • setISOKnown

      void setISOKnown(Boolean value)
      Sets the value of the ISOKnown field.
